titleStmt.title: An Ancient and present state of Poland giving a short, but exact, account of the scituation [sic] of that country, the manners and customs of the inhabitants, the several successions of their kings, their religion, &c., drawn out of their best historians : to which is added an impartial account of the death of the late king and the present election as it now stands.
titleStmt.author: Savage, John, 1673-1747.

notesStmt.note: Previously attributed to John Savage by Wing.
Item at reel 1643:11 identified as Wing S766 (number cancelled).
Reproduction of originals in the Huntington Library and the Trinity College Library, Cambridge University.
